name: worldlab
description: Open-source platform for interactive 3D worlds with promptable events and learning agents

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace=@worldlab/viewer && npm run build --workspace=@worldlab/dashboard
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/dist

author: Daniel
